item.title: Building an Effective Security Awareness Training Program: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Cybersecurity" , "Employee Training" , "Security Awareness" , "Risk Mitigation" , "Data Protection" , "Compliance" , "Cyber Threats" , "Insider Threats" , "Password Security" , "Phishing Awareness"
item.description: Learn how to build a comprehensive security awareness training program to protect your organization from cyber threats and empower employees.
